abstract: If Apple’s tablet does in fact have a 10-inch screen, it will need to be light and thin to make for manageable reading on public transport.
snippet: If Apple’s tablet does in fact have a 10-inch screen, it will need to be light and thin to make for manageable reading on public transport.
lead_paragraph: Yes, that’s right, ladies and gentlemen, it’s Apple iTablet time — oops, I mean iSlate time!

headline.main: What Would a 10-Inch Apple ‘iSlate’ Look Like?
